Description: The Rest on the Flight to Egypt; the Virgin seated with the Christ Child on her lap at left, sleeping with His head against her shoulder while she looks down to right, St Joseph standing beyond at right; first state before dedication in lettering; after Anthony van Dyck Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Schelte Adamsz. Bolswert
Curator's comments: After the painting by Anthony van Dyck in the Alte Pinakothek, Munich, inv.no.555.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (169) (Bolswert)
New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (542.I) (Van Dyck)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Clayton Mordaunt Cracherode (monogram with date 1789)
